players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.

You: "I am the detective and I know Bob is mafia.
"
You: "I will investigate Charlie next to gather more evidence."
Charlie: "Think carefully before you speak, as every word can be crucial. I will keep investigating and trying to gather more clues."
Bob: "I am the detective, and I know Bob is mafia. I will investigate Charlie next to gather more evidence."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob
